 1999-14581999-08-170,  FAIT,  ,  ,  , 
PrecisAuthority for the Minister of Foreign Affairs (a) to sign, subject to ratification, the Acts of the XXII CONGRESS of the UNIVERSAL POSTAL UNION, BEIJING (1999), or (b) to execute and issue an Instrument of Full Powers authorizing other members of the Canadian delegation to sign those Acts on behalf of the Government of Canada.
